languages.text: "Зачем же ты меня позвал{mf||а}? Я думала, ты хочешь узнать, как в {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitasGlossary}Адепта Сороритас{/g} проводят свободное время".
"Then why have you summoned me? I thought you wished to know how the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitasGlossary}Adepta Sororitas{/g} take their leisure."
languages.original_text: "Зачем же ты меня позвал{mf||а}? Я думала, ты хочешь узнать, как в {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitasGlossary}Адепта Сороритас{/g} проводят свободное время".

traits.locale_text: "Then why have you summoned me? I thought you wished to know how the Adepta Sororitas spend their free time."
"Then why have you summoned me? I thought you wished to know how the Adepta Sororitas spend their free time."
"Then why have you summoned me? I thought you wished to know how the Adepta Sororitas take their leisure."
"Then why have you summoned me? I thought you wished to know how the Adepta Sororitas take their leisure."
"Then why have you summoned me? I thought you wished to know how the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitasGlossary}Adepta Sororitas{/g} take their leisure."
"Then why have you summoned me? I thought you wished to know how the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitasGlossary}Adepta Sororitas{/g} take their leisure."

languages.text: « Pourquoi m'avoir appelée, dans ce cas ? Je croyais que vous vouliez savoir ce que font les membres de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitasGlossary}Adepta Sororitas{/g} dans leur temps libre. »
languages.original_text: "Then why have you summoned me? I thought you wished to know how the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitasGlossary}Adepta Sororitas{/g} take their leisure."

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi m'avoir appelée, dans ce cas ? Je croyais que vous vouliez savoir ce que font les membres de l'Adepta Sororitas dans leur temps libre. »
« Pourquoi m'avoir appelée, dans ce cas ? Je croyais que vous vouliez savoir ce que font les membres de l'Adepta Sororitas dans leur temps libre. »

languages.text: «¿Por qué me ha convocado, entonces? Pensé que quería saber qué hacían en su tiempo libre las miembros del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitasGlossary}Adepta Sororitas{/g}».
languages.original_text: "Then why have you summoned me? I thought you wished to know how the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitasGlossary}Adepta Sororitas{/g} take their leisure."

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué me ha convocado, entonces? Pensé que quería saber qué hacían en su tiempo libre las miembros del Adepta Sororitas».

languages.text: “那你为什么要把我叫过来？我还以为你想了解一下{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitasGlossary}战斗修女{/g}平时都做些什么呢。”
languages.original_text: "Then why have you summoned me? I thought you wished to know how the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitasGlossary}Adepta Sororitas{/g} take their leisure."

traits.locale_text: “那你为什么要把我叫过来？我还以为你想了解一下战斗修女平时都做些什么呢。”

languages.text: 「では、なぜ私を呼び出したのですか？{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitasGlossary}修道聖女会{/g}がどのように余暇を 過ごしているのか知りたかったのでは？」
languages.original_text: "Then why have you summoned me? I thought you wished to know how the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitasGlossary}Adepta Sororitas{/g} take their leisure."

traits.locale_text: 「では、なぜ私を呼び出したのですか？修道聖女会がどのように余暇を 過ごしているのか知りたかったのでは？」

languages.text: "Warum habt Ihr mich dann gerufen? Ich dachte, Ihr wolltet wissen, wie die {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitasGlossary}Adepta Sororitas{/g} ihre Freizeit verbringen."
languages.original_text: "Then why have you summoned me? I thought you wished to know how the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitasGlossary}Adepta Sororitas{/g} take their leisure."

traits.locale_text: "Warum habt Ihr mich dann gerufen? Ich dachte, Ihr wolltet wissen, wie die Adepta Sororitas ihre Freizeit verbringen."

languages.text: "Öyleyse beni neden çağırdın? {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitasGlossary}Adepta Sororitas{/g}'ın boş zamanlarını nasıl değerlendirdiğini öğrenmek istediğini düşünmüştüm."
languages.original_text: "Then why have you summoned me? I thought you wished to know how the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitasGlossary}Adepta Sororitas{/g} take their leisure."
